Reason: The configuration option _journalSerializer is performance-sensitive. This is because the journalSerializer() method is called in the create() method of the Prevayler class, which is a critical part of creating a Prevayler instance. The journalSerializer() method is responsible for serializing the journal data, which can be time-expensive and memory-expensive operations. Any inefficiencies in the journalSerializer() method can lead to notable performance variations at the system level, making this configuration performance-sensitive.
